content: SeedlyTV EP05 REITs Property Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 22 May 2019How many REITs would be a good number to invest in to be sufficiently diversified?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Ericsson TingLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 15 Jun 2019You can choose a few sector e g healthcare which is defensive or you can choose a diversifed reit like suntec8 main type of REITsLink:https://www.fool.sg/2018/07/12/8-different-types-of-reits-and-stapled-trusts-listed-in-singapore/Industrial 
ResidentialRetail
Hotel and resort
Office
Healthcare
Specialized
Diversified
1. IndustrialAscendas Real Estate Investment Trust (SGX: A17U) and Mapletree Industrial Trust (SGX: ME8U) 
2. ResidentialAscott Residence Trust(SGX: A68U) 
3.RetailCapitaLand Mall Trust (SGX: C38U), Frasers Centrepoint Trust (SGX: J69U)
4.Hotel and resortsFrasers Hospitality Trust (SGX: ACV) and OUE Hospitality Trust (SGX: SK7)
5.OfficeCapitaLand Commercial Trust (SGX: C61U)
6.HealthcareFirst Real Estate Investment Trust (SGX: AW9U) and Parkway Life REIT (SGX: C2PU)Do visit my blog  to find out more:http://sonicericsg.blogspot.com/2018/10/post-54week-39learning-tradinginvesting.html?m=1Thanks for reading!0 comments0
